text: "Thnks fr th Mmrs" is a 2007 song by Fall Out Boy. It is the second single from Infinity on High, the band's fourth album. It was released on March 27, 2007 in the United States. The title is "Thanks for the Memories" without the vowels. The song was able to make it to #9 on the Pop 100, #11 on the Billboard Hot 100, #13 on the Mainstream Top 40, #14 on the Adult Top 40, #14 on the Dance Club Songs, #19 on the Alternative Airplay, and #23 on the Rock Digital Songs charts. It was also certified 2Ã— Platinum by the Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA). It was used by Network Ten in Australia to promote the 2007 AFL Finals Series. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2007 songs Category:Fall Out Boy songs
title: Thnks fr th Mmrs
